title: 1.14正版版本地图加载完成后闪退问题
author: heqihuan1997
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Surprise! Haha. Well, this is awkward.

Time: 19-5-2 下午11:42
Description: mouseClicked event handler

replies.author: xiaopangju
replies.txt_content: 建议先删除游戏版本，然后下载完整的资源文件，一一检查一下，你电脑的驱动，实在不行还可以试试重装一下java
